questions.question: What is the correct form? 'If you _____ hard, you will pass the exam.'
Which sentence is a correct example of the first conditional?
options: If she calls, I will answer.
If she called, I would answer.
If she had called, I would have answered.
questions.answer: If she calls, I will answer.
